sections.heading: Clerk; judicial statistics; report
sections.text: The clerk of each court shall report judicial statistics to the Supreme Court at such times and in such manner as prescribed by the Supreme Court.SourceLaws 1961, c. 103, ยง 1, p. 335;R.S.1943, (1989), ยง 24-337.01;Laws 1991, LB 732, ยง 35.
